==========================

Virtual Lab UTM – Online simulation of a real lab or content that allows students to perform experiments or activities and learn concepts without the need for physical equipment, materials or space. With the use of computer graphics, animations, sounds and interactive elements to create realistic and engaging environments, it provide a new way of learning for students to explore and manipulate. Flexible and easy to access entering UTM Laboratory to gain your experience and knowledge in your own time & personal space.

[Visit Portal](https://vrlab.utm.my/)

_**Welcome to the UTM Center for Advancement in Digital and Flexible Learning (UTM CDex)**_

Let me begin by extending a warm welcome to you and thanking you for taking time to visit our portal. At UTM CDex, we are deeply committed to advance Teaching & Learning (T&L) excellence across the UTM community. We aim to transform our educators in their T&L practices through the use of technology and inspire innovative academic programmes through flexible and experiential educational frameworks. Working in partnership with academic schools and faculties, we offer a wide range of services and resources to facilitate hybrid and flexible learning including access to expertise in the development of MOOCs and Micro Credentials. We believe UTM CDex will serve as a hub to support and promote T&L excellence as we champion the integration of transformative pedagogy with innovative technology via our hallmark NALI framework in enriching student-centered learning experiences at UTM. UTM CDex is determined to widen its horizon and break boundaries in ensuring that our educators are future ready and our students are future proof. Feel free to browse through our resource pages and our UTM CDex team is also available to assist you. Thank you.

![](https://utmcdex.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Dr.Nurbiha.jpg)

#### ASSOC. PROF. DR. NURBIHA A SHUKOR

Director,  
_UTM Center for Advancement in Digital and Flexible Learning (UTM CDex)_
